attributes.action: instruct the Chancellor of the Exchequer to immediately recover the GBP20 billion of taxpayers money handed to HBOS executives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HBOS executives and senior managers obviously lied over the state of their company because if they had needed to be shored up, financially, they would not have been able to afford to pay GBP320,000.00 for a staff party.  This is an obvious example of the government being duped and the taxpayer being taken advantage of for personal gain by privileged individuals and must be stopped.  All taxpayer funds must IMMEDIATELY be withdrawn from HBOS.  If HBOS goes under as a result, then shareholders can blame it on the party!
